experienceOne: I developed a login system for an in-house CMS using React.js on the frontend and Python on the backend. I also implemented SOLID, Clean Code and Software Architecture principles. I added services like Redux, Redux Toolkit, SQLAlchemy and used Digital Ocean and Docker. I applied Singleton design patterns and took into account the SOLID principle of Single Responsibility. In addition, I created a server-side application with Python using FastAPI and used Git and Github for version control.
experienceTwo: In charge of the development of the main Landing Page of the stock exchange using Vue.js. In addition, I applied principles such as SOLID, Clean Code and Software Architecture. I added additional services such as i18N, Vuex, TailwindCSS and SAS. I implemented Singleton design patterns and took care of the UX/UI design. I also worked on the login system and frontend admin development. I used Git and Github for version control.
experienceThree: I was responsible for developing the main application and the administrator using Vue.js. Applying principles such as SOLID, Clean Code and Software Architecture, I managed to create efficient solutions. In addition, I added additional services such as Vuex, TailwindCSS, SASS, among others. I implemented Singleton design patterns and took care of specific server-side tasks using Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB. I used Git and Github as a version controller. This experience allowed me to acquire technical skills and work on large projects.
experienceFour: As a Front End developer in React.js, I have worked in different Fintech projects, where I have been in charge of the maintenance and creation of new features. During my experience, I have performed the migration from Class Components to Functional Components using hooks. In addition, I have used services such as Redux, Redux Toolkit, Redux Thunk, SASS, StyleSheet Component and i18n. I apply design patterns and principles such as SOLID, Clean Code and Software Architecture. I also have experience using tools such as SCREM (Bitbucket, Confluence, JIRA, among others). My goal has always been to develop quality applications, following best practices and using modern technologies.
